Ad Text:
6-month contract + extensions
Sydney based
Flex work environment – 3 days onsite/2 days remote
About the Role:

We are seeking a skilled IVR Developer to join our team on a 6-month contract based in Sydney. This is an exciting opportunity to work on cutting-edge voice and conversational AI solutions within a secure environment.

Key Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and maintain IVR applications using VXML (Nuance, Cisco CVP).
Integrate and enhance IVR systems with JavaScript for dynamic call flows.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement Conversational AI solutions.
Work with NLU/NLP platforms such as Google Dialogflow, IBM Watson, and Amazon Lex.
Ensure solutions meet performance, usability, and security standards.

Required Skills & Experience:

Proven experience in IVR development using VXML, preferably with Nuance and Cisco CVP.
Strong proficiency in JavaScript.
Hands-on experience with Conversational AI and Natural Language Understanding (NLU).
Familiarity with NLP platforms like Dialogflow, Watson, or Lex.
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

Security Requirements:

Australian Citizenship is mandatory.
NV1 Security Clearance or willingness to undergo clearance is required.
This role is being recruited in partnership by Recruitment Practice Lead Doug Hitos & Lead Recruiter Aparna Sharma. Doug & Aparna share more than 25 years IT recruitment experience. Both have been successful throughout their careers in placing the right candidate for the right job. To find out more about this opportunity, please ‘Apply Now’
